data.name: Hayles Quest
data.detailed_description:
Darkness has engulfed the land, raising the un-dead and other unholy creatures from their very graves. Grasping his sword, Hayle sets out on a quest to vanquish the darkness and restore the light.

In the tradition of the classic side scrolling platformers of yesteryear, such as Ghouls & Ghosts, Castlevania e.t.c comes Hayles Quest, a fast paced and challenging platformer, paying homage to those mentioned greats, with a few surprises thrown into the mix!

The game will be split into chapters and once the other chapters are released you will get them free of charge (via update).



Take up your sword and use the power shield bestowed upon you by the gods, to fight the evil that has tainted the land. To restore the balance between light and the darkness!

This Hack N Slash, Bat N Ball hybrid, brings a fast paced arcade action game to your screen. This brutally hard and unforgiving game will challenge new & veteran gamers alike! Can you unlock all of the games achievements? Hahahahahahahaha Good luck mortal.

Please share this page on your social media sites, friends, family, dogs, cats and the un-dead! Please help spread the word!

Thanks so much!

content_descriptors.notes: Hayle is on a quest to vanquish the darkness and restore the light to the land. In doing so he has to slice and dice a hoard of the un-dead and other monstrosities. Recommended for 15+.
